articles.author: Suzanne O'Malley
articles.title: The Golden Bachelor’s Not-So-Golden Past - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Secret girlfriends, a juiced-up résumé and the selling of a septuagenarian stud: The secret history of America’s senior sweetheart, Gerry Turner.
articles.content: By sharp contrast to the young cads with sixpack abs previously populating the hot tubs on ABC’s The Bachelor, Gerry Turner, the handsome, 72-year-old star of The Golden Bachelor spinoff, brought fre… [+12097 chars]
